text: yesterday one of the world's most
beautiful countries with the most
sincere people Indonesia was hit yet
again by twin natural disasters an
earthquake and a tsunami
the footage is numbing to watch bus
gumpa tragedy the city of Paulo known as
the paragliding capital of Indonesia was
instantly turned into a graveyard
it's lovely coastline was engulfed by 18
foot waves leaving over a thousand dead
and tens of thousands homeless hotels
collapsed shopping malls crumbled houses
were crushed people were left trapped
under buildings and scrambling around
streets to survive if you can remember
just one month ago the well-known
islands of Bali Lombok and Gilley were
slammed with two earthquakes in a week's
time leaving hundreds of others dead and
thousands more without a home could you
imagine living through this the reason I
am making this video is to raise
awareness and bring our network together
to help support the victims and their
families for those who are willing to
lend a hand I've included a link to
donate in the description below on a
personal note Indonesia is one of my
favourite countries and I've been back
four times since my first visit in 2014
you cannot beat the friendly faces
stunning nature the beaches here
unbelievable man delicious foods and
humbling culture it's an affordable
paradise for anyone's holiday and it
just crushes my heart that thousands of
people have lost their lives for no
reason thank you for your attention and
for your donations I can assure you that
vulnerable children and families in Pulu
will be very grateful for your support
at the very least join me in keeping
Paulo in your thoughts and prayers and
share this video to help spread the
message
[Music]
